scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop --config src/config/database.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:create --config src/config/database.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config src/config/database.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250410141623-seed-type-transactions.cjs --config src/config/database.cjs
scripts.db:test: npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250414201134-demo-users.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250414201142-demo-institutions.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250414201146-demo-accounts.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250414201151-demo-transactions.cjs
scripts.db:start: npx sequelize-cli db:create --config src/config/database.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config src/config/database.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:seed --seed 20250410141623-seed-type-transactions.cjs --config src/config/database.cjs
